sourceMeaningMnemonic: A <radical>mountain</radical> <radical>branch</radical> will <kanji>branch off</kanji> from the rest.
meaningInfo: Picture this part of the mountain, branching off from the rest, into a mysterious path of its own.
readingMnemonic: If you want to <kanji>branch off</kanji> from your hiking group and explore this branch of the mountain, you need a special <reading>key</reading> (<ja>き</ja>). Just don't get caught down there or you'll get the <reading>gui</reading>llotine (<ja>ぎ</ja>).
readingInfo: If you branch off from the beaten path, you need 1) access, and 2) to be really careful so you keep your head.
